name: KROG
description:
Krog is a platformer where the objective is to get to the end alive and as soon as possible. But beware, there are many dangers such as water or laser beams which can damage your character and send you back to the start faster than you can blink. Will you be able to overcome the challenge?

MOST RECENT UPDATE:

v.1.0.0 05/04/2020

CONTROLS:

WASD: Movement

Left Click: Hook shot

Right Click: Hook release

Shift: Walk

CONTACT:
